title: Top Movies
description: Multi-page web app built using React Router and API to display current top movies.

title: Happy Thoughts
description: Fullstack Twitter-like web app built in React for posting and liking happy thoughts.

title: To Do
description: Web app built in React using Redux to make user add, check and delete tasks.

title: Weather App
description: Web app built in JavaScript using data from open weather API, showing weather based on IP-address.

title: Music Releases
description: Web app built in React showing 2019 new album and single releases from Spotify API.

title: Tech Movie Quiz
description: Multiple choice quiz built in React using Redux, displaying progress and summary with score.

title: Random Survey
description: Multiple questions survey with summary at the end built in React.

title: GitHub Tracker
description: Tracker of my Technigo projects, using Github API and chart from chart.js.

title: Guess Who
description: Digital version of the board game "Guess Who" built in JavaScript that filters characters based on user guesses.
